conbody.p: In addition to the document API, xml-types defines an xml-types:Data.XML.Types:Event datatype. This can be used for constructing streaming tools, which can be much more memory efficient for certain kinds of processing (eg, adding an extra attribute to all elements). We will not be covering the streaming API currently, though it should look very familiar after analyzing the document API.
conbody.note: You can see an example of the streaming API in the Sphinx case study.
